name: awards
description: List of dehydrated Award objects representing awards or grants associated with this work.

fields.name: affiliations
fields.description: Each institutional affiliation that this author has claimed will be listed here: the raw affiliation string that we found, along with the OpenAlex Institution ID or IDs that we matched it to.

fields.name: author
fields.description: An author of this work, as a dehydrated Author object.

fields.name: author_position
fields.description: A summarized description of this author's position in the work's author list. Possible values are first, middle, and last.

fields.name: countries
fields.description: The country or countries for this author.

fields.name: institutions
fields.description: The institutional affiliations this author claimed in the context of this work, as dehydrated Institution objects.

fields.name: is_corresponding
fields.description: If true, this is the corresponding author for this work. If false, this is not the corresponding author. If null, either this work has no corresponding author, or we are not aware of it.

fields.name: raw_affiliation_strings
fields.description: This author's affiliation as it originally came to us (on a webpage or in an API), as a list of raw unformatted strings. If there is only one affiliation, it will be a list of length one.

fields.name: raw_author_name
fields.description: This author's name as it originally came to us (on a webpage or in an API), as a raw unformatted string.

name: authorships
description: List of Authorship objects, each representing an author and their institution.

fields.name: provenance
fields.description: The source of this data. Currently the only value is “doaj” (DOAJ)

fields.name: value_usd
fields.description: The APC converted into USD.

name: apc_list
description: Information about this work's APC (article processing charge).

fields.name: provenance
fields.description: Currently either openapc or doaj, but more will be added; see below for details.

fields.name: value_usd
fields.description: The APC converted into USD.

name: apc_paid
description: Information about the paid APC (article processing charge) for this work.

fields.name: is_oa
fields.description: True if this work is Open Access (OA).

fields.name: landing_page_url
fields.description: The landing page URL for this location.

fields.name: license
fields.description: The location's publishing license.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The name of the source.

fields.name: host_organization
fields.description: The host organization for this source as an OpenAlex ID. This will be an Institution.id if the source is a repository, and a Publisher.id if the source is a journal, conference, or eBook platform (based on the type field).

fields.name: host_organization_name
fields.description: The display_name from the host_organization, shown for convenience.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for this source.

fields.name: is_core
fields.description: Whether this source is identified as a core source by CWTS, used in the Open Leiden Ranking of universities around the world. The list of core sources can be found here.

fields.name: is_in_doaj
fields.description: Whether this is a journal listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ).

fields.name: is_oa
fields.description: Whether this is currently fully-open-access source. This could be true for a preprint repository where everything uploaded is free to read, or for a Gold or Diamond open access journal, where all newly published Works are available for free under an open license.

fields.name: issn
fields.description: The ISSNs used by this source.

fields.name: issn_l
fields.description: The ISSN-L identifying this source. This is the Canonical External ID for sources.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of source.

fields.name: raw_type
fields.description: The type, according to this location's source. This uses whatever controlled vocabulary that source happens to fancy. So for example: if the location is from from Crossref, you'll see a term from the Crossref type vocabulary in the location.raw_type field.

fields.name: source
fields.description: A dehydrated Source object.

fields.name: pdf_url
fields.description: A URL where you can find this location as a PDF.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version of the work, based on the DRIVER Guidelines versioning scheme.

fields.name: raw_type
fields.description: The type, according to this location's source. This uses whatever controlled vocabulary that source happens to fancy. So for example: if the location is from from Crossref, you'll see a term from the Crossref type vocabulary in the location.raw_type field.

name: best_oa_location
description: A Location object with the best available open access location for this work.

name: biblio
description: Old-timey bibliographic info for this work. This is mostly useful only in citation/reference contexts.

name: citation_normalized_percentile
description: The percentile of this work's citation count normalized by work type, publication year, and subfield. This field represents the same information as the FWCI expressed as a percentile. Learn more in the reference article: Field Weighted Citation Impact (FWCI).
The number of citations to this work. These are the times that other works have cited this work: Other works ➞ This work.
name: cited_by_count
concepts
description: List of dehydrated Concept objects.
OpenAlex IDs of any authors for which authorships.is_corresponding is true.
name: corresponding_author_ids

description: OpenAlex IDs of any institutions found within an authorship for which authorships.is_corresponding is true.
name: corresponding_institution_ids

description: Number of distinct country_codes among the authorships for this work.
name: countries_distinct_count

description: The date this Work object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.
name: created_date

description: Exactly the same as Work.title. It's useful for Works to include a display_name property, since all the other entities have one.
name: display_name

description: The DOI for the work.
name: doi

description: The Field-weighted Citation Impact (FWCI), calculated for a work as the ratio of citations received / citations expected in the year of publications and three following years.
name: fwci
funders
description: List of dehydrated Funder objects representing the funders of this work.
Set to true if the work's abstract is searchable in OpenAlex.
name: has_abstract

description: The OpenAlex ID for this work.
name: id

fields.name: openalex
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID, which is also found at Work.id

fields.name: doi
fields.description: The DOI. This is most likely, but not necessarily, a Crossref DOI

fields.name: mag
fields.description: the Microsoft Academic Graph ID

fields.name: pmid
fields.description: The Pubmed Identifier

name: ids
description: All the persistent identifiers (PIDs) that we know about for this work, as key: value pairs, where key is the PID namespace, and value is the PID. IDs are expressed as URIs where possible.
The sources this work is indexed in. Possible values: arxiv, crossref, doaj, pubmed.
name: indexed_in

description: Number of distinct institutions among the authorships for this work.
name: institutions_distinct_count

description: True if we think this work is paratext.
name: is_paratext

description: True if we know this work has been retracted.
name: is_retracted

description: True if this work is part of the XPAC (Expansion Pack) dataset.
name: is_xpac
keywords
description: Keywords extracted from the work's title, along with confidence scores from the extraction model.

name: language
description: The language of the work in ISO 639-1 format.

name: license
description: The license applied to this work at this host. Most toll-access works don't have an explicit license (they're under all rights reserved copyright), so this field generally has content only if is_oa is true.

fields.description: True if this work is Open Access (OA).

name: locations
description: A list of Location objects describing all unique places where this work lives.

name: locations_count
description: Number of locations for this work.

fields.name: is_oa
fields.description: True if this work is Open Access (OA).

fields.name: oa_status
fields.description: The Open Access (OA) status of this work.

fields.name: oa_url
fields.description: The best Open Access (OA) URL for this work.

fields.name: any_repository_has_fulltext
fields.description: True if any of this work's locations has location.is_oa=true and location.source.type=repository.

name: open_access
description: Information about the access status of this work, as an OpenAccess object.

name: primary_location

name: primary_topic
description: The top ranked Topic for this work.
The day when this work was published, formatted as an ISO 8601 date.
name: publication_date

description: The year this work was published.
name: publication_year

description: OpenAlex IDs for works that this work cites. These are citations that go from this work out to another work: This work ➞ Other works.
name: referenced_works
sustainable_development_goals
description: The United Nations' 17 Sustainable Development Goals are a collection of goals at the heart of a global shared blueprint for peace and prosperity for people and the planet.

name: topics
description: The top ranked Topics for this work. We provide up to 3 topics per work.
The title of this work.
name: title

description: The type of the work.
name: type

description: The last time anything in this Work object changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string. This date is updated for any change at all, including increases in various counts.
name: updated_date
